2011-06-01|2012-12-30.description:
IDW's The Library of American Comics invites you to (g-gulp!), (chuckle), (sigh!!), and (*moan*) like a real Dogpatcher at all the fun and excitement in Volume 3 of The Complete Li'l Abner!

Enjoy breakneck comedy in these daily and full-color comic strips from 1939 and 1940, as Al Capp spoofs the movies Topper and The Grapes of Wrath-sends Lonesome Polecat and Hairless Joe to New York, armed with a fresh batch of Kickapoo Joy Juice-gets Adam Lazonga, the world's greatest lover, to give lessons in how to woo a gal 'Dogpatch-style'- and stages a battle for the ages as Mammy Yokum throws down against mean ol' Mother Ratfield!

Eisner-winning editor and designer Dean Mullaney and writer Bruce Canwell continue to examine this slice of pure Americana.
2011-06-01|2012-12-30.name: Volume Three: 1939-1940

volume.name: Al Capp's Li'l Abner Complete Daily & Color Sunday Comics

2011-06-01|2012-12-30.description:
Proper Japanese Title: チーム烏野、始動 (CHIIMU Karasuno, Shidou)

Chapter Titles

  • Chapter 17: A Storm (嵐 "Arashi")
  • Chapter 18: The One Called the "Ace" (“エース”と呼ばれるひと ""EESU" to Yobareru Hito")
  • Chapter 19: True Feelings (本音 "Honne")
  • Chapter 20: The Guardian Deity (“守護神” ""Shugoshin"")
  • Chapter 21: A Toss to the Ace (エースへのトス "EESU e no TOSU")
  • Chapter 22: Admiration (憧れ "Akogare")
  • Chapter 23: Equivalent Points (同じ１点 "Onaji Itten")
  • Chapter 24: Team Karasuno, Full Speed Ahead (チーム烏野、始動 "CHIIMU Karasuno, Shidou")
  • Chapter 25: Encounter (遭遇 "Souguu")
  • 24 Bonus: T-Shirt Back Situation (Tシャツ裏事情 "T SHATSU Ura Jijou")
2011-06-01|2012-12-30.name: Team Karasuno, Full Speed Ahead

2011-06-01|2012-12-30.description: James Asmus and Billy Tan bring together the stars of the two biggest new Marvel series - GAMBIT AND HAWKEYE SAVE LIVES!
2011-06-01|2012-12-30.name: Black Panther + Storm; Hawkeye + Gambit

2011-06-01|2012-12-30.description: Christmas means it's time for Gotham's annual tree-lighting ceremony. But when the children's choir goes missing from the celebration, it's up to Batman and Nightwing to track down the culprit and free the children. An uplifting tale of forgiveness to melt all hearts of ice.
2011-06-01|2012-12-30.name: Christmas

2011-06-01|2012-12-30.description:
Amethyst finally meets her murderous Aunt Mordiel in person! But it turns out that Queen Graciel has secrets of her own. Will House Amethyst be further driven apart?

Plus: In the backup, story Beowulf leans the disturbing secret behind the war that ravaged the DC Universe!
2011-06-01|2012-12-30.name: Family Reunion; Chapter IV: Iron Trolls

2011-06-01|2012-12-30.description: With a day left until Christmas, and time running out for Santa's innocent victims, Happy the Horse learns what turned Nick Sax from golden cop to broken-down hitman. But can he convince Nick to do the right thing or is it Happy's turn to face some uncomfortable home truths?

Monsters are killing civilians in the Utah desert, leading Professor Bruttenholm to recall the last time a government operation cracked open reality to unleash something from another world: Project Ragna Rok.
2011-06-01|2012-12-30.name: 3 (of 5)

2011-06-01|2012-12-30.description: Costumed crime fighter Empowered makes an ill-fated visit to a top-secret dumping ground for ultratech "superdebris" and wrecked "villainware" left over from cape-on-cape battle. Can Emp and her hapless teammate, Mechanismo, avoid annihilation when the junkyard nano spawns an apocalyptic cheesecake plague of flirty but lethal "cyberangels" and sensual but savage "devil mecha”?
2011-06-01|2012-12-30.name: Hell Bent Or Heaven Sent

2011-06-01|2012-12-30.description:
A young boy—the heir to the title of Count Dooku—is kidnapped, and it’s Jahan Cross to the rescue!

When the kidnapper turns out to be a sexy female spy with whom Cross has worked before, and when her motives turn out to have the boy’s welfare at heart, Cross is faced with a decision: should he disobey his own orders from the Empire?

But first there’s a little matter of breaking out of a supposedly inescapable prison . . .
2011-06-01|2012-12-30.name: Part (3 of 5)

volume.name: Star Wars: Agent of the Empire - Hard Targets

2011-06-01|2012-12-30.description:
Following the bloody wake of murdered gods across the depths of space, Thor tracks the God Butcher into the present!

Discovering a forgotten cave on earth that echoes with the cries of tortured gods...the Thunder God is shocked to find himself among them...!
2011-06-01|2012-12-30.name: The God Butcher, Part Three of Five: The Hall of the Lost

2011-06-01|2012-12-30.description:
Legion must keep his inner demons in check long enough to help newly-manifested mutant twins who are being exploited by a criminal cartel in Japan.

But the twins may just have plans of their own.

As do Legion's inner demons...
2011-06-01|2012-12-30.name: Prodigal, Part 3

2011-06-01|2012-12-30.description: HOT NEW SERIES FROM THE CREATOR OF ADVENTURE TIME! This clown planet is getting the Bravest Warriors super-down, man. But if someone needs saving, then they're the dudes to do it! The comic adaptation of the new show from ADVENTURE TIME creator Pendelton Ward!
2011-06-01|2012-12-30.name: Bravest Warrior

2011-06-01|2012-12-30.description: She tried the easy way... Kirsty Cotton wanted no part of the deadly war waged between the Wolfes & the Nethercoates, but with the surviving members of both clans seeing the Cenobite Queen as their salvation, Kirsty will have to take a side - her own!

volume.name: Clive Barker's Hellraiser: The Road Below

2011-06-01|2012-12-30.description: ORIGIN OF EVIL PART 3! It's Ernie versus Widmark Prison's gen pop in a battle to the death, but Ernie's powers are running low - how will he survive?! Plus, Ernie comes face to face with his wicked foster father, Buford for the first time since his transformation! Will it be the last? Also, Uriel, the angel in charge of people's destinies comes down from Heaven to tell Ernie what's what and Smiley doesn't like it one bit!
2011-06-01|2012-12-30.name: Origin of Evil Part 3: Am I Evil?

2011-06-01|2012-12-30.description: The Borg story to end all Borg stories warps towards it thrilling conclusion! In the far-flung future the Borg Queen faces off against the Borg King: an ancient Locutus! The stakes have never been so high, as the fate of the Enterprise - and the entire galaxy - hang in the balance!

volume.name: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Hive

2011-06-01|2012-12-30.description:
Issues #27-29 are collected in Volume 3 of Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles Classics. Includes "Dreams of Stone," "Sons of the Silent Age," and "Men of Shadow" with stories and art by Michael Dooney, Jim Lawson, Steve Murphy, and A.C. Farley.

Story Titles

  • Dreams of Stone
  • Sons of the Silent Age
  • Men of Shadow
2011-06-01|2012-12-30.name: Vol. 3

2011-06-01|2012-12-30.description: En route to Moscow, MacGyver and Kari find themselves on a plane journey to certain death when an old nemesis of Mac's returns to claim his bounty - and things go from bad to worse! Catch up with the series everyone's talking about, co-written by MacGYVER creator LEE DAVID ZLOTOFF!
2011-06-01|2012-12-30.name: Part 3

2011-06-01|2012-12-30.description: Sexica runs into some old Organ hounds from the Red city that have discovered a magic secret about the city built into the Whaling wall.
2011-06-01|2012-12-30.name: 6th Degree

2011-06-01|2012-12-30.description:
The epic series that reinvents Greek and Roman mythology continues here!

Julian finds himself in an all-out death match with the god of the seas himself - Neptune!

The Godstorm rages on as these two titans face off in an Earth-shaking battle of strength and will! Can Zeus and his daughter, Heather Angelos, step in before it's too late? Or is Julian in too deep to be saved?

With the story by Joe Brusha (Grimm Fairy Tales, Neverland) and written by Zenescope's Patrick Shand (Robyn Hood), this series is going to blow you away!

Chapter Titles

  • Chapter 11: School festival excitement
  • Chapter 12: Liar, liar
  • Chapter 13: Unexpected elopement
  • Chapter 14: Bayside baby
  • Chapter 15: The bath of impending doom!
  • Bonus Chat Corner
  • Bonus comic
  • Special thanks
2011-06-01|2012-12-30.name: Volume 3

2011-06-01|2012-12-30.description: Contains Weeks 9 - 12 plus bonus material! Nocturnus and Galahad have, reluctantly, joined forces against the criminal invasion storming the city of St. Barrington--but they very may well end up destroying each other before any common enemy can do it for them!
2011-06-01|2012-12-30.name: Volume 3

2011-06-01|2012-12-30.description: The geeky romantic comedy from the illustrator of MARRY ME continues! In this issue: Maureen takes center stage!

Wallace and Gromit, the inventor who always has a new idea, and his dog who always has to save the day, are back with a series of all-new adventures! 8 exciting tales await inside this fantastic collection of the Wallace & Gromit Daily Strips. There are jokes aplenty in this selection of fabulous funnies! Have a 'twitch' and go bird-watching with Wallace and Gromit - or join them on a trip to the zoo! How about a haircut? Wallace has the perfect tonic! And that's without mentioning the new chauffeur-driven limo service Wallace has started up... or his 'relaxing' camping trip! Wallace's weeks are filled with fun, surprises... and terrible puns!

Chapter 3 of 6. San Antonio, 1976: Eric Layton, desperate for cash, left college behind to dive into the world of pro-wrestling. From there, it was an easy slide into the underbelly of the "rasslin'" biz, where the box office and concession stand make for an easy way to launder drug money.
2011-06-01|2012-12-30.name: Blown Spot

2011-06-01|2012-12-30.description:
Well played, Darth Sidious. Well played. The end of the Clone Wars is in sight, but so are the end of the Jedi and the fall of the Republic!

Obi-Wan Kenobi recruits Anakin Skywalker in a desperate hunt for dark Jedi Asajj Ventress that will lead to a showdown with General Grievous and Count Dooku. Elsewhere, Jedi Generals infiltrate a Separatist base in hopes of concluding a protracted siege, and on Kashyyyk, as the clone troopers respond to Order 66, Master Quinlan Vos finds himself fighting against the army he led to victory. Collects Star Wars: Republic #70–#77 and #81–#83, Star Wars: Obsession #1–#5, and Free Comic Book Day 2005.
2011-06-01|2012-12-30.name: The Republic Falls

2011-06-01|2012-12-30.description: Lost in the wondrous land of Gassamyr, Jenna and her brother Denny quickly realize that their presence has not gone unnoticed. Dangerous creatures are on the hunt and the stranded siblings will have to count on new friends if they hope to survive in this new world.
The next exciting chapter! The Mortal Instruments: City of Bones, a young adult fantasy series in which a young teen girl discovers a shadowy world filled with demon-hunting warriors.

volume.name: The Mortal Instruments: City Of Bones

2011-06-01|2012-12-30.description: Lourdes awakens in an awkward spot, and reacts the only way she knows how. With fire! New character Toasty has his own problems when his solo adventured is crashed by an unexpected guest.... BONUS: This issue features redone artwork exclusive to the graphic novel editions of the book!

The End of Days is the third and the climatic finale in the highly anticipated trilogy from Heavy Metal, illustrated by Simon Bisley. The fate of humanity hangs in the balance as the armies of good and evil face-off in the final battle known as Armageddon.
2011-06-01|2012-12-30.name: Book III: The End of Days

volume.name: The Four Horsemen of the Apocalypse

2011-06-01|2012-12-30.description: When the first holy seal is broken the horsemen known as Pestilence is released into Hell and the end of days begins. Adam must convince the first Chosen, Jesse Grace to join him against the Horsemen, but Jesse, who was once a celebrated rock star, is now a drug addict only interested in finding her next fix. "The gritty art is symbiotic with the heart pounding story by Michael Mendheim." says, Rich Johnston, BleedingCool.com. Illustrated by Eisner award winner - Simon Bisley.
2011-06-01|2012-12-30.name: Pestilence

volume.name: The Four Horsemen of the Apocalypse

2011-06-01|2012-12-30.description: A world-famous pop star, frustrated with her love life, marries a random fan holding a MARRY ME sign in the audience at one of her concerts. In this issue: still on the run, Stasia takes her new husband to Africa! There they run into a very unexpected face. BONUS: The first character sketch of Parker, and a step-by-step visual tour of how a typical page is produced, from a simple sketch all the way to the final fully-colored page.

In the third collected volume of this critically-acclaimed webcomic series, Annie and Kat continue to uncover terrible secrets about their school, Gunnerkrigg Court, while relationships grow and the boundaries of reality are blurred. In the meantime, Coyote begins to show that things in the forest are not quite what they seem! Plus, Annie's second year at the Court comes to a dramatic end!
2011-06-01|2012-12-30.name: Volume 3: Reason

2011-06-01|2012-12-30.description: Collects the entire 'Knuckles Returns' storyline from Sonic Universe #9-12. Enter the Sonic Universe alongside Knuckles the Echidna! Rad Red is hot on the trail of his arch-nemesis, Dr. Finitevus. What he finds, however, is an ever-deepening mystery! But before he can investigate further, the newest Dark Egg Legion chapter attacks! To save Angel Island, Knuckles must team up with the Downunda Freedom Fighters - as well as Dr. Finitevus? New faces, new twists and surprises abound, and you cannot miss the thunderous showdown at the end!
2011-06-01|2012-12-30.name: Knuckles Returns

2011-06-01|2012-12-30.description: Another dinner at Grandma Duck's farm is finished and the time is right for reminiscing! Uncle Scrooge tells the tale of how he earned his third million, this time in the wonderful world of the cinema...
2011-06-01|2012-12-30.name: My Third Million

2011-06-01|2012-12-30.description: Mickey and Goofy find an unlikely ally in the Land of Trolls to help them on their quest, but first they must find the Land of Giants and recover the sword! The Prince of Fogs is closer than ever! Will our heroes overcome the dark forces of evil? Find out in the stunning conclusion of this adventurous saga!

volume.name: Mickey Mouse In The Sword Of Ice

2011-06-01|2012-12-30.description: Saburo Kazeda is Mutant Inazuman, and psychic seems to gather around him, some are school kids and one claims that she is his "mother" and all of them challenge Saburo with their supernatural power. He will even encounter "a boy with a guitar named Jiro" who is actually a robot but attacks Saburo. Now Inazuman faces a robot "Jiro", Jiro claims that "eliminating the human beings who destroys the earth and the environment is GOOD, if Inazuman protects the human beings I will eliminate Inazuman as well." Inazuman calls him "Kikaider," and says "you are wrong. Think about yourself."...
2011-06-01|2012-12-30.name: Vol. 3

2011-06-01|2012-12-30.description: The Black Ghost sends superior 00 number cyborg-assassins to eliminate the Cyborg009 team. Being proto-type cyborgs the Cyborg009 could only fight against the assassins as a team, or else defeated. Now 0013 in on his way to destroy Cyborg009 members, and 0013 has an advanced "acceleration mode" equipped, and accompanied with a huge gigantic enemy robot. Joe Shimamura recognize that 0013 is, just like every other Cyborg soldiers, abducted, transformed into a living weapon and manipulated by the Black Ghost.
2011-06-01|2012-12-30.name: Vol. 3

2011-06-01|2012-12-30.description: As Hayato Ichimonji becomes the second Kamen Rider, he visits his home town near the sea but it seems strange than ever. The people rejects him and he sees flying group of stingrays in the air, now battles the evil Shocker-Made-MonsterMan from the dark ocean. Crab MonsterMan and Missiles armed Shark Robots will pull Kamen Rider into the sea they are comfortable to fight in.
2011-06-01|2012-12-30.name: Vol. 3

2011-06-01|2012-12-30.description: Mitsuko finds a note to her saying it is from her father Komyoji and she is so delighted in such a time of danger when the DARK is sending the enemy robots against Jiro, the Android KIKAIDER and Mitsuko. The gigantic CrabRobots attack Jiro and Mitsuko, now Jiro without hesitation, knowing his mission, easily destroys the huge robots. Then a man naming himself Saburo now says he is one of the DARK, and claiming he has the "brain" of Komyoji, and his assassin name is Hakaider, developed for the only purpose to "Destroy (in Japanese "Hakai") Kikaider".
2011-06-01|2012-12-30.name: Vol. 3

2011-06-01|2012-12-30.description: The official prequel to the upcoming Marvel Studios blockbuster rages on! Follow Captain America through the explosive battles of WWII and discover why he America's first Super Soldier. This is Captain America live you've never seen him before!
2011-06-01|2012-12-30.name: Part 3

2011-06-01|2012-12-30.description: Stan Lee, the most colossal force in the history of comics, teams up with critically acclaimed writers Dan Abnett and Andy Lanning and superstar artists Javier Pina and Ramon Bachs for the dramatic, action-packed superhero scorcher, Soldier Zero! Half-Human. Half-Alien. All Weapon - and all in this brand new collection! Compiling the highly celebrated story arc that pits Soldier Zero against his greatest adversaries yet - The Inheritors!
2011-06-01|2012-12-30.name: The Inheritors

2011-06-01|2012-12-30.description: Superstar penciler Patrick Zircher joins award-winning writer Ed Brubaker! Former super villains in Witness Protection are being murdered! Does this have anything to do with the return of an old foe and ex-lover into Captain America's life? Cap must unravel the clues and solve this mystery before he becomes a target himself - but how will he handle the shocking truth when the new Scourge's secret identity is revealed? Collecting CAPTAIN AMERICA (2011) #11-14.
2011-06-01|2012-12-30.name: Volume Three

2011-06-01|2012-12-30.description: The latest issue of the critically acclaimed ongoing series from Alterna Comics. Zach has been captured, brainwashed and tortured... all for the good of the mysterious community called Towne. In this issue we learn a great deal more about the purpose of Towne and the mysterious project that seems to guide the destinies of its inhabitants. Also, a surprise ending that you will never, ever see coming.

Zenescope's entire Beauty and the Beast story arc is collected together for the first time! When Edward finally moved away from his abusive home life, he thought he had escaped the cycle of violence that was his life. But when his younger brother dies, Edward must come back to the one place where he thought he would never return. Now as Edward faces the monster who ruined his life, he will learn that sometimes the apple doesn't fall far from the tree. This unbleivable trade paperback collects Grimm Myths and Legends issues 12 through 15 and Grimm Fairy Tales issues 13 and 14.

Collects Myths and Legends #12-15 and Grimm Fairy Tales #13-14.
2011-06-01|2012-12-30.name: Vol. 3

2011-06-01|2012-12-30.description: Desperate to return the world to the way it once was, Barry Allen took a dangerous step in the race to regain his powers. But did his gamble pay off? And if it did, will he be fast enough to save the world before Aquaman and Wonder Woman tear it apart? With this special Digital Exclusive, you get the regular FLASHPOINT title along with pencils and inks!
2011-06-01|2012-12-30.name: Flashpoint Chapter Three of Five

2011-06-01|2012-12-30.description: Will secrets be revealed about the villainous Henry's past? Is George just a business client to Rain? How will Rain recover the valuable necklace? All of these questions will be answered in the penultimate issue 3.

Tasha Tasker, superpowered offspring of the President of the United States, returns in an all-new adventure! When a recon ship in the Arctic Ocean is attacked by mysterious forces, President Brad Tasker reluctantly sends his invulnerable daughter to investigate. BONUS: The first-ever Tasha Tasker prose adventure, "Thanksgiving in the Big Apple," finds Tasha protecting her father and the entire city of New York from a terrorist threat at the Thanksgiving Day Parade.
2011-06-01|2012-12-30.name: Blue. Part One

2011-06-01|2012-12-30.description:
“Kings are ever plagued by enemies.” The words of the Aquilonian ruler Conan are never more true than when a dark cabal of sorcerers threaten the throne and the lives of the royal family. But even against horrors from beneath the earth, murderous demons from beyond the grave, or ancient baleful gods summoned from dark dimensions, courage, love, and a good sword are formidable proof against evil when wielded by the mighty hand of the barbarian king!

Featuring early work of superstar artist Marc Silvestri.

Continues the re-presentation of the long-out-of-print Conan titles from Marvel Comics.
2011-06-01|2012-12-30.name: The Haunter of the Cenotaph and Other Stories

2011-06-01|2012-12-30.description:
The last stand against Gobgoblin and the new black suit of Spider-Man!

This issue contains: Amazing Spider-Man #650, 651.
2011-06-01|2012-12-30.name: Высокие ставки. Часть 3; Высокие ставки. Часть 4

2011-06-01|2012-12-30.description:
Deadman’s adventures continue in these 1970s tales collected for the first time!

Collecting PHANTOM STRANGER #33 and 39-41, THE BRAVE AND THE BOLD #133, SUPERMAN FAMILY #183, WORLD’S FINEST #223 and 227 and DC SUPER-STARS #18!
2011-06-01|2012-12-30.name: Book Three

2011-06-01|2012-12-30.description:
The world after Siege. What will happen to New Avengers? The last stand of New Avengers! Fearless superheroes versus two dangerous and cunning villains: The Hood and Madame Masque!

This issue contains: New Avengers Finale (one-shot).
2011-06-01|2012-12-30.name: Новые Мстители: Финал

2011-06-01|2012-12-30.description:
Iron Man... returns?!

Will Iron Man back to superhero life and beat the Ghost?

This issue contains: Invincible Iron Man #24, the stories "Heavy Rain" and "Killer Commute" from one shot Iron Man: Titanium
2011-06-01|2012-12-30.name: Тони Старк: Распад. Часть 3; Железный дождь; Опасная пересадка

2011-06-01|2012-12-30.description:
The Armageddon is over and The Devil has won. In this latest collection of stories culled from the hit Shadowline Web comic series, learn how the previous NIGHTMARE WORLD tales of Irish fairy-folk, vengeful zombie killers, alien ultra-heroes, Cthulhu and more combine with these 13 new tales of terror to reveal Lucifer's sinister plan to control Creation, revealing the haunted underbelly of a monstrous world all too similar to our own in the chilling tradition of "Tales from the Crypt" and "The Twilight Zone."

Includes an introduction by GARY (Deadworld) REED, re-mastered art, a bonus prose story and more!
2011-06-01|2012-12-30.name: Volume Three: Demon Days

2011-06-01|2012-12-30.description:
Alice may have found friends in Wonderland, but there are some people she just cannot bring herself to like, first among them being Blood the Hatter. But when Alice is invited to the Queen of Heart’s ball, where friends and foes gather, there is no way she can refuse—for everyone knows what happens to those who say no to the queen. Will Alice manage to navigate the dangerous party in one piece, much less have any hope of returning to her own world?

Chapter Titles

  • Chapter 25: Dance Lesson
  • Chapter 26: Rising of the Curtain
  • Chapter 27: Rondo
  • Chapter 28: Rabbit's Waltz
  • Chapter 29: Serenade
  • Chapter 30: Secret Garden
  • Chapter 31: Ticktock
  • Chapter 32: Distance
  • Chapter 33: Die is Cast
  • Chapter 34: End of Dream
  • Chapter 35: Wonderful Wonder World
2011-06-01|2012-12-30.name: Volume 3

volume.name: Alice in the Country of Hearts

2011-06-01|2012-12-30.description: After Max subdues the colossal skeletal minion of hell he finds himself set upon by a plethora οf tiny demonic trouble. Now Max has to bite the bullet and face a long forgotten adversary that threatens Pakita's very soul. How many limbs does he have to loose in order to win her heart?

At the beginning of Volume Three, Julius and Lily are recovering from the electrifying end of Volume Two. What does the future hold for Evelyn Crow and her gang of desperate villains? Do Julius and Lily have the strength to prevent Urkaz Grope from enacting his evil plans? Don't miss the stunning conclusion to the biggest adventure in comics! "The Rainbow Orchid" is an ambitious blend of classic storytelling, and cinematic artwork, in which adventure, historical drama and legend are seamlessly intertwined.
2011-06-01|2012-12-30.name: Volume Three

volume.name: The Adventures of Julius Chancer: The Rainbow Orchid

2011-06-01|2012-12-30.description: Abaddon's crusade escalates. Agents Townsend and Benson make a discovery. David makes a deal.

Satan's Circus of Hell contains horrific humor in the classic pulp comics tradition, and enough sex, sleaze and sadism to corrupt modern minds. Reader discretion is advised. Robert Steven Rhine (Girl's and Corpses) presents a horror anthology loaded with more gore, terror and humor that you can swallow--or choke on! It's dark, horrific and very funny. This full color graphic fiction extravaganza features the top horror illustrators from around the world. This issue brings six tales of terror. "Beached Whale" (John Watkins Chow) tells the tale of a group of friends and their discovery on a beach , "Anna" (Tone Rodriguez) is the story of a geek who gets his sweet revenge, "SAM R I " (Mark Covell) takes us back to the high school recess where a bully tries to take advantage of a wimpy kid. In "The Adventures of Dr. Narcolepsy" (Kevin Colden) a doctor takes a holiday at the wrong time. "The Magician From Hell" (D.W. Frydendall) is a tale of gore and magic. The issue closes out with a tale of robotic terror--"LEZBOTS". Pinups by Nenad Gucunja, Bryan Baugh David Hartman, Alex Pardee

COBRA COMMAND AFTERMATH! It's a new day for the JOEs-as they crawl from the ruins of "Cobra Command", they find a new status quo... and a change in command! The stories from G.I. JOE, SNAKE EYES, And COBRA converge in this volume plus the G.I. JOE: Cobra Annual is included.

Collects (Cobra Annual 2012, G.I. Joe #12, Snake Eyes #12 &Cobra #12)
2011-06-01|2012-12-30.name: Vol. 3: Aftermath

2011-06-01|2012-12-30.description:
Introducing the D&D campaign EBERRON to comics and learn the strange history it shares with the threat of INFESTATION 2. Also, one of the Turtles has been taken by something in the dark depths of the sewers, and it's up to his brothers to save him. When it all comes down to the final battle, C.V.O. is scattered across America, and one of their own may be the key to stopping the threat once and for all-but not without a tremendous sacrifice. Danger Girl and others are on hand to help, but will it be enough?

Collects Infestation 2: Dungeons & Dragons #1-2 and Infestation 2: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles #1-2
2011-06-01|2012-12-30.name: Volume 3

2011-06-01|2012-12-30.description: Le temps passe sur l'île de Puerto Blanco. Emilio, Raffy et Maria tracent leur chemin sur ces terres soumises au règne de la vengeance... et de l'amour. Et les destins s'accomplissent, inexorablement. Alors que d'autres secrets affleurent, la mer apporte des nouvelles du Barracuda, mais aussi du capitaine de la Loya. L'ombre du diamant du Kashar plane sur ce troisième album, qui clôture le premier cycle...
2011-06-01|2012-12-30.name: Duel

2011-06-01|2012-12-30.description: The Devastator is the comedy magazine for humans, not dragons or spaceworms. Every issue is a mix of funny writing and comics by writers and artists from The Onion, Conan, Adult Swim, Marvel, DC Comics and more! In our third issue, we inhale the world of cats like sweet, sweet nip, with parodies of Garfield, LOLcats, Hello Kitty and so much more, featuring contributions from Jeffrey Brown, Mike Sacks and Becky + Frank! BONUS: Our novelty book for cat ladies, 400 Reasons To Get Married... To Your Cat! Whatever you do, keep this issue away from ALF.
2011-06-01|2012-12-30.name: Cats

2011-06-01|2012-12-30.description: Leafstar is struggling to keep SkyClan united in the wake of the flood that destroyed their camp, but her Clanmates are scared of what might happen next. Entering Cancertown to rescue a homeless man named Razor, Morley discovers the Corpsegrinder, a major player in Cancertown politics, in a state of distress. The Corpsegrinder grows in size in response to others' fear of him, and Morley finds him in his most terrible form. Psychologically incapable of fearing for his own life, Morley extracts the cause of the Corpsegrinder's current state - a terrified man left stranded in Cancertown. Leaving the Corpsegrinder's turf with the stranger, Morley finds Razor in the hands of another Cancertown player - the sinister, deadly Crosshair...

Collecting issues #48-72, the final issue! Welcome to the last, bloody stand of The Boys! Billy Butcher, Wee Hughie, Mother's Milk, The Frenchman, and The Female have driven the superhumans of the world -- and the shadowy agencies backing them -- to the very brink. Now, it's all-out war! But will all The Boys come out unscathed... and will those that live through the endgame survive one another when all is said and done? Featuring the creative talents of Garth Ennis, Darick Robertson, Russ Braun, and John McCrea, this collection is the must-read conclusion to the explosive BOYS epic!

Air mercenary leader Dark Bird puts the pressure on Gina's friend, top pilot Kevin 'Ace' Koss, to hitch up with her sexy top gun, Skippy. Gina's ex-rival, Penny Pincer, has to risk her life in a dogfight with Skippy to win him back-but only after she and Gina smooth some ruffled feathers on a super space fortress in lunar orbit. Then Gina and her student Kylie embarrass Brit' with geekery as they race to save fellow explorer Isaac Elite from a curse four generations old!

Wait... that's how this thing works right? What were the rules again? Mac just may learn that his biggest challenge still lies ahead of him!

2011-06-01|2012-12-30.description: Billy’s got a good life with Mum and Dad. Plenty of play, a little homework, and a smart, loving dog. Of course there’s the occasional hitch: that nosy, bossy old maid of a neighbour—and her Siamese cat—or the cheeky beat cop Agent 22. But it’s never too serious, and even Dad’s occasional embarrassing blunders can’t spoil things for long. After all, as long as you have friends, everything will be all right in the end!

2011-06-01|2012-12-30.description:
ALREADY A CULT SERIES!

The Powers are the first to populate the Earth. When Man appeared, he created among them passion and division. They will all take human form: Dragons, Giants, Angels, Sirens and Fairies. Then came the time for fights, internal wars...

A thousand years have gone by, and the Sons of the earth ended up creating the biggest of kingdoms. For them, the Powers are only legends anymore... But the Dragons came out of their lair...

A new age is coming: is it the end or the beginning of servitude?
2011-06-01|2012-12-30.name: L'Adieu aux Rois

2011-06-01|2012-12-30.description: The concluding volume of Elric's epic return to comics and graphic novels! Signs appear throughout the Multiverse that the Cosmic Balance is in peril, and the Eternal Champion is caught in the crosshairs! Across worlds, Elric, Hawkmoon and Corum begin to face the force that threatens to overpower them all, while Eric Beck, a modern-day videogame designer, must acknowledge that his reoccurring dreams of a Pale Prince aren't all in his head. Join New York Times bestseller Chris Roberson (SUPERMAN, iZOMBIE, STAN LEE'S STARBORN) as he teams up with legendary fantasy author Michael Moorcock to bring Elric back to comic books in an original ongoing series!
2011-06-01|2012-12-30.name: Volume 3

2011-06-01|2012-12-30.description: Starborn sees Stan Lee join forces with New York Times bestselling writer Chris Roberson (Superman, iZombie, Cinderella: From Fabletown with Love) and world class artists Khary Randolph (Spider-Man, Teen Titans Go!) and Matteo Scalera (Deadpool) to present Volume 3 of the graphic novel series that is truly not of this world. A perfect jumping-on point for new readers, this collection sees Benjamin Warner fight to accept his unforgivable past as he takes up the unbelievable mantle of Starborn. With new menacing villains and other familiar superheroes, this graphic novel volume continues to be the most scintillating sci-fi superhero epic on the shelves.
2011-06-01|2012-12-30.name: Volume 3

2011-06-01|2012-12-30.description:
If you enjoy Club Penguin, you'll love the Official Club Penguin Magazine!

It's full of tips and inside-information to help you explore Club Penguin and includes lots of opportunities to win coins. It features exclusive comic strips starring your favourite Penguins and their Puffle pals!

Puffle Rescue Colour Competition in this issue:

15 lucky winnners will each win...

A puffle with hat plush,

A new penguin plush,

A 6 month membership to Club Penguin.

Comicdom's #1 non-team is back, and they've never been better! Hulk, Dr. Strange, Sub-Mariner, Valkyrie and Nighthawk team with Luke Cage, Daredevil and Son of Satan to take on the likes of the Wrecking Crew, Satannish and Asmodeus! Then, spinning out of MARVEL TWO-IN-ONE, comes Steve Gerber! Deconstructing genre conventions with a healthy dose of absurdity, Gerber's innovative Defenders run turned readers' expectations on their heads - so suitably we're including the original Atlas Era appearances of the Headmen: Gorilla Man, Jerold Morgan and Chondu the Mystic! Topped off with a GIANT-SIZE battle royale with the Grandmaster and a Squadron Sinister rematch, this one is a MARVEL MASTERWORKS if there ever was! Collecting DEFENDERS (1972) #17-21, GIANT-SIZE DEFENDERS #2-4, MARVEL TWO-IN-ONE #6-7; and material from MYSTERY TALES #21, WORLD OF FANTASY #11 and TALES OF SUSPENSE (1959) #9.
2011-06-01|2012-12-30.name: Volume 3

2011-06-01|2012-12-30.description:
Third fist-throwing issue featuring one of Hollywood's most recognisable stars, action icon MR. T!

Mr. T and new sidekick, Indigo Jo, head to England to bodyguard a vicar, but things are far from what they seem, especially with the arrival of... The Quad Squad! And just WHO is that lurking in the shadows waiting to strike? He sure looks familiar!

Executive Editor Mr. T provides a foreword and exclusive interview.

About the author of MR. T: During his brief time in the comic book industry, writer Chris Bunting is already known for creating licensed/IP and original property stories - including adaptations of literary works - aimed at both the younger reader market and adult market.

About the artist of MR. T: South American illustrator, J.L. Czerniawski, has worked in both the fantasy and comic book industries, including providing art for such properties as Transformers, Night of the Living Dead, and - with the movie's director Joe Carnahan - Smokin' Aces.
2011-06-01|2012-12-30.name: Episode 3

2011-06-01|2012-12-30.description:
The situation in Sherwood gets even crazier with the arrival of the most feared and powerful vampire ever: Dracula the Impaler!

And to add to the chaos, he's decided to bring along the hulking Frankenstein. But will anything bring this monster out of his slumber?

The surprises and unexpected guest stars don't end there, as this clash of timeless characters takes yet more unexpected twists and turns.

Is there enough room left for Robin Hood, Jekyll & Hyde and (the other) Dracula to battle it out? Of course there is, as the reasons for the... bad blood... between them begins to come to the surface.

From the fevered imaginations of writer Chris Bunting and artist JL Czerniawski.

volume.name: Dracula vs. Robin Hood. vs. Jekyll and Hyde

2011-06-01|2012-12-30.description:
Collects Soulfire Volume 3 issues #0-8.

The magic has returned! But, this time... the light has grown dark.

Desperate times have fallen on our heroes Malikai, Grace, and friends. The once-strong bond between them, which forged the return of magic into our world, is deteriorating following the cataclysmic battle with Rainier and his forces. However, the struggle between magic and technology still wages on, yet with Malikai, the bearer of the light, nowhere to be found--can magic survive the latest onslaught from an unwelcome world? New adversaries, exotic locations, and a fresh cast of exciting characters, including some from the Soulfire Universe's long forgotten past, reign supreme in this debut of the epic third SOULFIRE volume!

Brought to you by red-hot writer J.T. Krul, with art by talented Aspen newcomer Jason Fabok, along with colorist John Starr, the latest volume of Michael Turner's thrilling fantasy-adventure SOULFIRE series begins right here!

Collects Michael Turner's Soulfire Volume 3.

Final trilogy "First Flight" will bring answers to many important questions in the history of Alex, but also pose new. Driven by destiny, and the mystical power of Wretched Polish Knight, White Eagle and Hudini, will go to the place where discover the secret research of Techcorp - the serum. At the White Eagle, will be waiting another challenge - this time will have to face ... his feelings.

2011-06-01|2012-12-30.description: This sketchbook covers French comic artist Bruno Bellamy. Sketches inside display variations on the female form, from rough pencil sketches to finished pieces. Measures 7' x9' and features 48 color pages. The sketchbooks are numbered to 900 and signed by the authors on the inside first page. French text.

Scooby and Shaggy are spending the summer as counselors at Camp Kichihaha. But -- zoinks! -- a horrible swamp creature is haunting the camp! Can the two buddies unmask the toxic terror before they get swallowed up in green goo?
2011-06-01|2012-12-30.name: Camp Fear

2011-06-01|2012-12-30.description: Enough is enough. Gurgazon the Pit Demon has been welcomed, nurtured, fed, and complimented. Gurgazon can tolerate no more! The time has come, once and for all, for escape! The Lewellyn-Vane house has been mapped. The plans are laid out. The ghosts are ready. The only thing that still stands in their way is... The butler. But is Gurgazon prepared for him this time? Can he really be defeated? POSSESSIONS BOOK 3: THE BETTER HOUSE TRAP is the third in the YALSA award-winning slapstick series by Ray Fawkes, coming from Oni Press in March 2012!

2011-06-01|2012-12-30.description: This third volume recounts the Wright Brothers, who invented the modern aeroplane. The brothers made the first controlled, powered and sustained heavier-than-air human flight on 17 December 1903 and, in the two subsequent years, they developed their flying machine into the first practical fixed-wing aircraft. Although not the first to build and fly experimental aircraft, the Wright brothers were the first to invent aircraft controls that made fixed wing flight possible.

2011-06-01|2012-12-30.description: My name is Kaguya. In an instant, I went from being a regular high school student to a savior princess. Now I have been driven into another universe, where fate binds me to its salvation. I find myself traveling with a beautiful woman named Bambi and a strange doll named Gold that protects me at any cost. Both of them are supremely skilled in what they do, yet I feel utterly useless! I was hoping to befriend Bambi and prove my worth during our travels, but I cannot seem to find a way to make my mark. Along the way, we meet the wise Waseda, who comes from my world. Can he help me fulfill my given destiny and find my way back home?

2011-06-01|2012-12-30.deck: Alpha Flight battles some random villains, but ultimately narrowly defeats Omega Flight after a horrific turn of events.  The Hulk makes an appearance but fails to defeat Canada's premier super team.  Finally, Secret Wars II crosses into our story but fails to derails it.
2011-06-01|2012-12-30.description:
Canada's mightiest heroes face threats of all sizes, ranging from the overweight Pink Pearl to the Maniacal alchemist Diablo! And when the terrible secret of Sasquatch's origin is revealed, Alpha Flight must battle the Great Beasts in their own realm - and pay a fearsome price! Then, Alpha Flight's former leader, Guardian, returns from the grave - or does he? What's he doing palling around with the villainous Omega Flight? And where does the Beyonder fit in? Finally, when Alpha Flight goes fishing in another dimension, they accidentally hook the Incredible Hulk! Will the jade giant smash the heroes beyond all repair? Only the series new creative team knows! It's north-of-the-border action just the way you like it!

Collects Alpha Flight #20-29, Incredible Hulk #313 & Secret Wars II #4.

2011-06-01|2012-12-30.description:
It's 1967 - and Andy Clark, Dennis Daniels, Pig Meachum, Jimmy Rubino and the rest of the 23rd Infantry Brigade (Mechanized) are on the Ho Chi Minh Trail for the holidays. Meanwhile, back in the World, Sen. Robert Kennedy has an important day of his own. New soldiers enter the war, and old ones leave it - and there are too many bad ways to leave a war. Plus: The battle lines get even blurrier as enemies display their humanity, and soldiers show their darker sides. Includes rarely seen stories from Marvel's black-and-white magazines.

Collects The 'Nam #21-30 and material from Savage Tales (1985) #1 and #4.

Prepare to be horrified by all the blood, bats, fangs and coffins you can handle! Witness Morbius the Living Vampire desperate for blood, unleashed upon the Old West and in the clutches of the mysterious Morgana! See Blade the Vampire Slayer against the legions of the unliving dead! Experience the tragic tale of Bernardo Latta and the impossible quest of Zarathon! Including a surprise appearance by Jack the Ripper!

2011-06-01|2012-12-30.deck: In this volume 3 of Sorcelleries, Valero and Guarnido offer us a vision of the most zany fairy!
2011-06-01|2012-12-30.description:
The third episode of Sorcelleries opens with a hell of a mess! A baby fairy, Hazel, has decided to stay in the world of witches, which is not to displease them. But Titiana, the queen of fairies, does not hear it that way! To make matters worse, Rex, a human being married to a (charming) witch, decides to organize a game show that involves children ... including Hazel.

This third installment closes the Sorcellerie series, a humor comic book for young and old.
